Title: App License Delivery SDK
Description: Secure the installation of alternative distribution apps on iOS or iPadOS devices by vending licenses from your web server.

Title: Apple Pay Merchant Token Usage Information API
Description: Add details about your merchant token usage information package.

Title: Apple Pencil
Description: Enhance your iPad app’s user experience by supporting drawing, handwriting, and other features of Apple Pencil.

Title: Apple silicon
Description: Get the resources you need to create software for Macs with Apple silicon.

Title: Enterprise Program API
Description: Automate the tasks you perform on the Apple Developer website.

Title: HTTP Live Streaming
Description: Send audio and video to iOS, tvOS, and macOS devices.

Title: Human Interface Guidelines
Description: The HIG contains guidance and best practices that can help you design a great experience for any Apple platform.

Title: Mac Catalyst
Description: Create a version of your iPad app that users can run on a Mac device.

Title: MusicKitJS
Description: MusicKit on the Web brings Apple Music to your website — with songs, music videos, radio stations, and full access to the Apple Music API. And now with MusicKit Web Components, you can build richer integrations with less code, faster.

Title: Professional Video Applications
Description: Exchange data with Final Cut Pro, and create effects plug-ins for Final Cut Pro and Motion.

Title: QuickTime File Format
Description: An object-oriented file format for the storage and exchange of digital media between devices, applications, and operating systems.

Title: Safari app extensions
Description: Learn how Safari app extensions extend the web-browsing experience in Safari by leveraging web technologies and native code.

Title: SecureElementCredential
Description: Allow access to credentials inside the Secure Element on device.

Title: TVML
Description: Use Apple TV Markup Language to create individual pages inside of a client-server app.

Title: USD
Description: An efficient and scalable way to represent 3D scenes.

Title: Vision
Description: Apply computer vision algorithms to perform a variety of tasks on input images and videos.

Title: visionOS
Description: Create a new universe of apps and games for Apple Vision Pro.

Title: watchOS apps
Description: Build watchOS apps that combine complications, notifications, and Siri to create a personal experience on Apple Watch.
